data.system_settings: A Chinese noname smartphone with Android 4.1.2, discord 3.5.7
data.actual_result: Only see the blank "here's a file" image with no text under it
data.short_description: Attributes of uploaded files can't be seen
data.steps_to_repro: - switch off the "show previews" for images and files - upload a file into chat/PM, or find one uploaded by anybody else - lool for file's attributes
